import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Modal, Button, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import {URL_IMAGE_PREFIX} from "../../constants"; import './example.css' const Example = (props) => { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const genreColor = [ {"id": 28, "name": "Action", "color": "Orange"}, {"id": 12, "name": "Adventure", "color": "lightpink"}, {"id": 16, "name": "Animation", "color" : "DeepBlueSky"}, {"id": 35, "name": "Comedy", "color": "MediumOrchid"}, {"id": 80, "name": "Crime", "color": "violet"}, {"id": 99, "name": "Documentary", "color": "sandybrown"}, {"id":18, "name": "Drama", "color": "hotpink"}, {"id":10751, "name": "Family", "color": "salmon"}, {"id": 14, "name": "Fantasy", "color": "turquoise"}, {"id": 36, "name": "History", "color": "khaki"}, {"id": 27, "name": "Horror", "color": "deeppink"}, {"id": 10402, "name": "Music", "color": "plum"}, {"id": 9648, "name": "Mystery", "color": "lavender"}, {"id": 10749, "name": "Romance", "color": "gold"}, {"id": 878, "name": "Science Fiction", "color": "skyblue"}, {"id": 10770, "name": "TV Movie", "color": "yellowgreen"}, {"id": 53, "name": "Thriller", "color": "brown"}, {"id": 10752, "name": "War", "color": "red"}, {"id": 37, "name": "Western", "color": "Goldenrod"}] return ( <> {props.movieDetail.title} { props.movieDetail.genre_ids } {props.movieDetail.genre_ids}

lalala

{props.movieDetail.original_title}
 ); } export default Example;
